definition.text: The Compound Ratio Weighted Moving average (CoRa) is a moving average that weights recent price action in a logarithmically linear way. This results in an indicator that has even less lag than the ALMA, WMA and EMA.

paragraphs.text: This indicator will plot a trend line similar in fashion to the SMA, EMA and other moving average based indicators.
The following properties are available to access:

| Product Name | Product Variable | Properties |
| CoRa | cora | value |
The parameters of the indicator's calculations can be changed by locating and opening the Javascript Code under Data Building Procedure -> Procedure Loop under "CoRa" Procedure Loop.
